price: oni i žene njihove bit će u hladovini na ukrašenim divanima naslonjeni,
arabic: هُمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجُهُمۡ فِي ظِلَٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hum wa-azwājuhum fī ẓilālin ʿalā al-arāiki muttakiūna
